Key Match Events: The Indiana Pacers picked up a 126-108 victory over the Phoenix Suns.
Tyrese Haliburton is averaging 20.2 points and 9.7 assists per game over the past 11 games, while shooting 48.1% from the floor.
Post-Match Reflections: Tyrese Haliburton admitted that this is the most fun he's had on the basketball court this season.
Haliburton mentioned that 'the ball is just moving. We're playing really well offensively.'
